name: gpx-tagger
description: An Electron application to add GPX metadata to image files
author: Dr. Martin von Berg

scripts.all: npm run main && npm run build && npm start
scripts.allprod: npm run main && npm run webprod
scripts.package: npm run allprod && npm run prepare-app && npm run install-app-deps && npx electron-packager ./app GpxTaggerApp --platform=win32  --arch=x64 --out=dist --overwrite --app-version=1.3.0 --app-copyright="Copyright (c) 2026 Dr. Martin von Berg" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Dr. Martin von Berg" && npm run finalize-app
scripts.package:linux: npm run webprod && npm run prepare-app && npm run install-app-deps && npx electron-packager ./app GpxTaggerApp --platform=linux  --arch=x64 --out=dist-linux --overwrite --asar=false
scripts.package:mac: npm run webprod && npm run prepare-app && npm run install-app-deps && npx electron-packager ./app GpxTaggerApp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=dist-maxOS --overwrite --asar=false
